channel.title: Autotalker help
channel.description:
im new to scar :| and i need a tutorial about a skill like wc and stuff...Anyway
I need help on my autotalker scar it says i need a variables wich is a "var" can anyone update my script? And can someone give me a tutorial about the whole scar thing? I know how to use it i just need help how to set up the whole skill wc thing. If i did something stupid and dont now how to script please send me a tutorial if you can. i clipped my scar script at the bottom where the paper clip is since i dont know how to add it with the "insert script" button.
**junky**

item.title: Autotalker help
item.dc:creator: @elfonso elfonso
item.description:
@elfonso wrote:

[scar]program autotalker;
const
message1=(‘hi people!!’); //type what you want him to say this is a example
message2=(‘auto talking please wait till trade hit ctrl+alt+s to stop’);

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(3000) // how many seconds do you want him to say it each time
SendKeys(message1) // change uptop to say something diffrent
SendKeys(chr(13))
wait(1000)
SendKeys(message2)
SendKeys(chr(13))
end;

begin
repeat
autotalk;
until(false)
end.[/scar]

With the enter thing implied.

Read full topic

item.title: Autotalker help
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[scar]program autotalker;
const
message1=(‘hi people!!’); //type what you want him to say this is a example
message2=(‘auto talking please wait till trade hit ctrl+alt+s to stop’);

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(3000) // how many seconds do you want him to say it each time
SendKeys(message1) // change uptop to say something diffrent
wait(1000)
SendKeys(message2)
end;

begin
repeat
autotalk;
until(false)
end.[/scar]
Fixed it for you.

Just go to the SCAR Tutorials section for tutorials

Read full topic
